body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, stone sawyer. Native of England. Son of Charles Hurle and Elizabeth Hurle. Married to Mary Ann Hudson Hurle in London, England, on May 25, 1845. Father of Abraham Hurle and Sarah A. Hurle. Immigrated to the United States on November 28, 1848. Stone sawyer in Jefferson County, Indiana, in 1850. Stone sawyer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1858. Sawyer in Louisville in 1861. Stone sawyer in Louisville in 1865.
